name: DocumentationTemplatesAndRules
publisher: HL7 Clinical Decision Support Work Group
description: Guidelines for documentation templates and rules for coverage requirements

grouping.name: Profiles
grouping.description: Profiles to be supported by EHRs and payor systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Example(s)
grouping.description: Example(s) showing the use of the DTR

resource.name: DTR Task - STU3
resource.description: The Task resource is used to allow users to generate requests for information during the flow of DTR

resource.name: DTR Questionnaire - STU3
resource.description: The Questionnaire resource is used to represent the information needs that a payer has to satisfy their documentation requirements and/or rules

resource.name: DTR QuestionnaireResponse - STU3
resource.description: The QuestionnaireResponse resource is used to represent the information supplied by the provider

resource.name: DTR Task Example - STU3
resource.description: An example task to request the creation of a blood gass panel

resource.name: DTR Home Oxygen Therapy Questionnaire - STU3
resource.description: An example questionnaire that shows how to use DTR to collect documentation requirements for home oxygen therapy

resource.name: DTR Home Oxygen Therapy QuestionnaireResponse - R3
resource.description: An example questionnaire response for home oxygen therapy that is populated after being filled in using the SMART on FHIR application within DTR
